ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.label: Ornithomimus
ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.description: A relatively small ancient omnivorous lizard. Judging by some data, he could have feathers. He was quite fast and walked on his feet.

ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.label: Cactipineus
ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.description: An ancient genetically modified creature designed to survive in the desert. It was small and had a slow metabolism.

ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.label: Dromaeosaurus
ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.description: A rather low predatory lizard, which, apparently, could defeat large herbivores. He was capable of wide jumps and fast running.

ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.label: Velociraptor
ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.description: A small and fast predatory lizard with a large number of teeth and feathers.

ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.label: Dilophosaurus
ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.description: Small carnivorous dinosaur with sparse and long teeth. He had a crest, which was probably used as a sign of distinction among relatives.

ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.label: Materpiscis
ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.description: An ancient viviparous fish, presumably carnivorous and aggressive.

ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.label: Flamingo
ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.description: A relatively small ancient omnivorous lizard. Judging by some data, he could have feathers. He was quite fast and walked on his feet.

ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.label: Diplomoceras
ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.description: It belongs to an extinct group of cephalopods with tentacles - ammonites. Together with its shell, the animal reached several meters in length.

ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.label: Parasaur
ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.description: A large and fast herbivorous lizard with powerful legs and probably could have had the ability to learn.

ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.label: Iguanodon
ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.description: A large herbivorous pangolin, a distinctive feature of which was a large claw on its paws for protection from predators.

ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.label: Pachysaurus
ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.description: A large omnivorous lizard that had a very thick skull roof. The back of the head had blunt spines.

ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.label: Dimetrodon
ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.description: An extinct creature from the synapsid family that possesses a thermoregulatory crest. Presumably fed on everything that could overcome.

ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.label: Therizinosaurus
ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.description: An upright dinosaur with large claws on its front paws. The diet is not known, although it can be assumed that he was primarily a herbivore.

ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.label: Pterodactyl
ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.description: Pterodactyls were carnivorous pterosaurs and hunted fish and small animals. They had wings formed by a musculocutaneous membrane that extended from an elongated fourth toe to the hind limbs.

ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.label: Mouflon
ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.description: A mammal with massive horns that were used in ritual battles and for protection.

ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.label: Sarcosuchus
ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.description: A huge crocodile-like lizard that lived in the water. Ate large fish and animals.

ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.label: Ankylosaurus
ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.description: A huge dinosaur, covered with durable plates, and also has a powerful tail. Contrary to first impression, it was supposedly not aggressive.

ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.label: Triceratops
ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.description: A large herbivore with a characteristic horn on its head. He was able to fend off predators due to the lowness and thickness of the skin.

ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.label: Indosaurus
ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.description: A large predator, which was distinguished by the possible presence of horns above the eyes. He had a relatively large weight and body length.

ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.label: Stegosaurus
ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.description: Herbivorous dinosaur with a large number of dorsal plates. Presumably had a second brain in the coccyx area.

ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.label: Titanoboa
ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.description: A giant predatory snake that lived in hot and humid forests. Probably, extinction occurred due to the inability to feed such an organism.

ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.label: Spinosaurus
ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.description: An extremely large predatory dinosaur that hunted fish and animals near water bodies. He had a sail of bone plates.

ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.label: Tyrannosaur
ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.description: Huge and probably the most famous predator of its period. It has small front paws and a huge body size.

ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.label: Ancient Cybran bas-relief
ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.description: An ancient relief image of unknown origin.

ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.label: Ancient UEF bas-relief
ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.description: An ancient relief image of unknown origin.

ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.label: Boomalope fresco
ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.description: Ancient fresco depicting animals.

ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.label: Alpaca fresco
ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.description: Ancient fresco depicting animals.

ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.label: Goose fresco
ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.description: Ancient fresco depicting animals.

ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.label: Ancient fresco
ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.description: Ancient fresco with pictures.

ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.label: Hunting painting
ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.description: An ancient cave painting made thousands of years ago.

ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.label: Mammoth painting
ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.description: An ancient cave painting made thousands of years ago.

ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.label: Animals painting
ProjectParagon.Core.CultureSystem.Archeo.description: An ancient cave painting made thousands of years ago.
